phases.phase_overview: In the Explore phase, students will be introduced to the project's purpose, review key design documents, and cover foundational coding concepts necessary for the project.

lessons.lesson_title: Introduction to Mathletes: Python Geometry Adventure 2
lessons.lesson_overview: Introduce the project, its goals, and the learning outcomes. Discuss the importance of combining mathematics with Python programming.
Examine the detailed design documents, including pseudocode and architecture, to understand the project structure and flow.
Review essential Python programming concepts that will be used throughout the project, such as functions, loops, and data structures.

phases.phase_overview: In the Build phase, students will progressively develop the project codebase using provided skeleton files, focusing on implementing core functionalities.

lessons.lesson_overview: Guide students through setting up their development environment and understanding the provided skeleton files.
Focus on developing the core functionalities of the project, such as geometric calculations and user interaction.
Teach students how to integrate different modules and features to create a cohesive application.

phases.phase_overview: In the Launch phase, students will test, debug, and enhance the project to produce a robust final product ready for demonstration.

lessons.lesson_overview: Introduce testing methodologies and debugging techniques to ensure the project functions correctly.
Guide students in adding enhancements and optimizations to improve the project's performance and user experience.
Conduct a final review of the project and prepare students to demonstrate their completed work.
